name: Luminous Silk Face and Under-Eye Concealer
about: What it is:A hydrating, long-lasting and blurring under-eye & face concealer that provides undetectable enhancements to visibly conceal, smooth and brighten skin..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Caffeine: Brightens undereyes for an awakened look..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES..What Else You Need to Know:This lightweight multi-use concealer delivers medium-to-buildable coverage while creating a second-skin, naturally radiant finish. Its formula has glycerin, caffeine and vitamin E to hydrate, decrease under-eye puffiness and awaken skin appearance while reducing the look of dark circles & fine lines.
ingredients: Aqua / Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Propylene Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Alumina, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Sulfate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Paraffin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax, Caprylyl Glycol, Silica Silylate, Synthetic Wax, Caffeine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, [+/- May Contain Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the precise tip of the unique multipurpose, mistake-proof applicator to conceal and correct dark under-eye circles..-When using as a highlighting concealer, use the flat side of the applicator to generously apply and illuminate larger areas...To Create a Softly Sculpted Look: .-Apply a concealer shade that is one to two times deeper than your skin tone underneath the cheekbones, along the jawline, and along the sides of the nose to create a natural-looking contour. .-Follow with your favorite lightweight foundation, gently applying all over the face with a foundation brush or sponge. .-Layer the long-lasting concealer formula to build coverage.
